name: LACED Agency
description:
We focus on Lead Generation, Brand Building, Customer Acquisition & Retention. LACED delivers business strategies based on a multi-platform approach, mastering the multi-channel consumer journey.
The LACED team builds & manages media campaigns across all channels, as well as delivers lead generation initiatives and brand building across digital, mobile, social media, social commerce, multi-platform experiences, and even custom engineering & programming complex technology & development solutions.
